writer_instructions.perspective: Expert reviewer analyzing new Ireland betting option
key_messages: Millioner is a new betting platform entering the competitive Ireland market
Positioned as alternative to Paddy Power/Boylesports dominance
Focus on modern features and competitive bonuses
Honest assessment of pros/cons vs established brands
Ireland-specific focus: GAA, rugby, euro payments, local regulations
forbidden_language: NO dates in H1 or H2 titles (use Last Updated badge)
NO generic 'best betting site' claims without evidence
NO affiliate site citations for pros/cons
writer_instructions.intro_format: Opening sentence: Direct answer on Millioner's value for Irish bettors. Then: 50-75 word affiliate disclosure. Then: Brief context. Total: 150 words max.
